Text.Page:
The mercenaries are nothing after you've gone toe to toe with the {@LinkCreature:32#10#Sihran witches} and {@LinkCreature:32#11#polykinds}.

Just the sound of their spells sizzling through the air...well, if you think the mercenaries give you nightmares, there aren't words for what the witches will give you.

If someone could get them off the field, we'd have a much easier time of things.
No matter how brave you are, not having to face the witches again is a relief! Thanks!
If you eliminate the Sihran {@LinkCreature:32#10#witches} and {@LinkCreature:32#11#polykinds}, we can all get out of here a little sooner.
